name: Buttermilk Pancakes
ingredients: 2 Tbl salad oil ½ tsp soda
1 cup all purpose flour ½ tsp salt
1 1/3 cups real buttermilk (or half milk half sour cream) ½ tsp. salt
steps: Beat egg, add remaining ingredients in order listed and beat with rotary beater until smooth. Grease heated griddle
if necessary. Pour batter onto hot griddle and turn pancakes as soon as they are putted and full of bubbles.
Bake other side until golden brown.
½ tsp. baking soda ¼ cup sugar
Combine ingredients and make pancakes as usual.
